Name: Block_Quotes
Upper East Side: ["The neighborhood is great, with tons of restaurants and shops, and just a few blocks away from the subway and other public transportation, local parks, and museums - so it's convenient for both work and recreation.", 'The Yorkville (the part of Upper East Side that we live in) still retains some old German and East European flavor.']

Name: Lede
Upper East Side: The Upper East Side is sleek, chic, and classic NYC.  Door attendants receive your visitors and marble foyers open into grand ballrooms in this sophisticated neighborhood. As the height of luxurious living, the Upper East Sides immaculate brownstones are located around the corner from some of the citys finest designer boutiques. Paces away from Central Park and easily accessed by three subway lines, the Upper East Sides convenient location only adds to its upper-crust reputation.

Name: Intro
Upper East Side: Experience NYC the way stylish socialites do in the movies.

Name: Photo_Captions
Upper East Side: ["Doormen, bellhops, and curbside service characterize the Upper East Side, a neighborhood that's always dressed to the nines.", "Sometimes window-shopping is more fun than the real thing. Whether your jaw drops over penthouse apartments or floor-length gowns, you'll find something to admire in the Upper East Side.", 'With exhibitions curated by museums like the Guggenheim and the Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York City stands at the height of high-culture.', 'The neighborhood boasts more than first-rate museums. Its proximity to Central Park ensures the Upper East Side remains unequalled.', "Central Park's hidden paths often lead to sprawling green spaces.", "As New York's most famous park, it attracts thousands of visitors a day. Whether they're lounging, laughing, or picture-snapping, Central Park provides the perfect perch."]
